content: the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern in one printable file without advertisements the pattern is written in us terminology use this crochet pattern to make a retro style headband who wouldn t look cute in a headband like this the pattern includes all sizes from baby to adult the headband is worked using the same stitch as my popular brooklyn mittens pattern the extended single_crochet both the front and back of the stitch look equally good it is completely up to you which side you want to tie the bow on i hope you enjoy crocheting this headband
